text: Rita Mills (1934 – 2004) was an Australian singer from the Torres Strait Islands. She was part of the Mills Sisters with her sisters Cessa and Ina. She was born in 1934 on Naghir Island in Torres Strait. She lived on Thursday Island and during World War II was temporarily evacuated to the mainland. After she was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease in 2000 she moved to Cairns, retiring in 2001 and she died in 2004. ==Discography== * Blue Mountain (1999) * Mata Nice (2001) ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Indigenous Australian musicians Category:Torres Strait Islanders Category:Australian folk singers Category:20th-century Australian singers Category:20th-century Australian women singers
title: Rita Mills
